title: Foundations of Dental CBCT Image Analysis Using Semi-Supervised Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical and computer literacy skills
context.additional_context: Targeting general citizens without prior knowledge of medical image analysis, the program aims to educate real-life applicable mathematical modeling and semi-automated analysis techniques.

learning_goals: Explain the fundamental principles of semi-supervised learning and apply them to medical image analysis
Understand mathematical modeling methods for identifying anatomical structures in CBCT images
Practice techniques to enhance lesion detection accuracy with limited labeled data
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
